Class LoggingUtil

java.lang.Object
util.LoggingUtil
public class LoggingUtil extends Object
Provides centralized logging utilities for the e-voting system.

This utility class is responsible for:

  • Creating and configuring loggers for different components
  • Managing transaction contexts through MDC (Mapped Diagnostic Context)
  • Managing user contexts for audit logging

The class uses SLF4J for logging to provide a consistent interface regardless of the underlying logging implementation.

  • Method Details

    • getLogger

      public static org.slf4j.Logger getLogger(Class<?> clazz)
      Gets a logger for the specified class.
      Parameters:
      clazz - The class to get the logger for
      Returns:
      A configured SLF4J Logger instance

    • setTransactionContext

      public static void setTransactionContext(String transactionId)
      Sets the transaction context in the MDC.

      This method is used to track operations across multiple components that are part of the same logical transaction.

      Parameters:
      transactionId - The ID of the transaction to set in the context

    • clearTransactionContext

      public static void clearTransactionContext()
      Clears the transaction context from the MDC.

      Should be called when a transaction is completed to prevent context leakage between different transactions.

    • setUserContext

      public static void setUserContext(String userId)
      Sets the user context in the MDC.

      This method is used to associate log entries with a specific user, which is particularly useful for security audit logging.

      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user to set in the context

    • clearUserContext

      public static void clearUserContext()
      Clears the user context from the MDC.

      Should be called when operations for a specific user are completed to prevent context leakage between different user operations.
